content:
I was going to say that I think it would be nice to have a few photos and mementos of my great aunt on display during the reunion, just to kind of keep her memory present and celebrated throughout the day. Maybe we could even have a little area set up with some of her favorite things, like her favorite books or hobbies. Do you think that's a good idea?

And yeah, I was thinking of recruiting some volunteers from the family to help with setup, cleanup, and supplies. I don't want to put too much on any one person, but I think it would be a great way to get everyone involved and feeling like they're contributing to the event. We could also make a list of supplies and tasks and have people sign up in advance, so we can make sure everything gets covered.

What do you think about the idea of having some photos and mementos of my great aunt on display? Do you think that would be a nice touch, or would it be
